languages.text: "Планета вот-вот развалится! Если ты забыла, я в такой же опасности, как и ты. Будем стоять тут и дальше — взлетим на воздух".
"The planet is about to fall apart! In case you have forgotten, I am in as much danger as you are. If we continue to stand here doing nothing, we are all dead."
languages.original_text: "Планета вот-вот развалится! Если ты забыла, я в такой же опасности, как и ты. Будем стоять тут и дальше — взлетим на воздух".

traits.locale_text: "The planet is about to fall apart! In case you have forgotten, I am in as much danger as you are. If we stand here doing nothing, we are going to get blown up."
"The planet is about to fall apart! In case you have forgotten, I am in as much danger as you are. If we stand here doing nothing, we are going to get blown up."
"The planet is about to fall apart! In case you have forgotten, I am in as much danger as you are. If we stand here doing nothing, we are going to get blown up."
"The planet is about to fall apart! In case you have forgotten, I am in as much danger as you are. If we stand here doing nothing, we are going to get blown up."
"The planet is about to fall apart! In case you have forgotten, I am in as much danger as you are. If we continue to stand here doing nothing, we are all dead."
"The planet is about to fall apart! In case you have forgotten, I am in as much danger as you are. If we continue to stand here doing nothing, we are all dead."

languages.text: «¡El planeta está a punto de colapsar! Por si lo ha olvidado, sufro el mismo riesgo que usted. Si seguimos aquí sin hacer nada, estamos todos muertos».
languages.original_text: "The planet is about to fall apart! In case you have forgotten, I am in as much danger as you are. If we continue to stand here doing nothing, we are all dead."

traits.locale_text: «¡El planeta está a punto de colapsar! Por si lo ha olvidado, sufro el mismo riesgo que usted. Si seguimos aquí sin hacer nada, estamos todos muertos».

languages.text: “这颗行星马上就要灰飞烟灭了！希望你别忘了，我当下的处境和你一样危险。如果我们继续在这里浪费时间，那所有人都只有死路一条。”
languages.original_text: "The planet is about to fall apart! In case you have forgotten, I am in as much danger as you are. If we continue to stand here doing nothing, we are all dead."

traits.locale_text: “这颗行星马上就要灰飞烟灭了！希望你别忘了，我当下的处境和你一样危险。如果我们继续在这里浪费时间，那所有人都只有死路一条。”

languages.text: 「この惑星は崩壊しようとしている！忘れたのかもしれないが、{mf|俺|私}は君と同じくらい危険にさらされている。{mf|俺|私}たちがここに立ったまま何もしないでいると、全員死んでしまう」
languages.original_text: "The planet is about to fall apart! In case you have forgotten, I am in as much danger as you are. If we continue to stand here doing nothing, we are all dead."

traits.locale_text: 「この惑星は崩壊しようとしている！忘れたのかもしれないが、{mf|俺|私}は君と同じくらい危険にさらされている。{mf|俺|私}たちがここに立ったまま何もしないでいると、全員死んでしまう」

languages.text: « La planète est sur le point de s'effondrer ! Au cas où vous l'auriez oublié, je risque ma vie tout autant que vous. Si nous continuons à rester plantés là sans rien faire, nous sommes tous morts. »
languages.original_text: "The planet is about to fall apart! In case you have forgotten, I am in as much danger as you are. If we continue to stand here doing nothing, we are all dead."

traits.locale_text: « La planète est sur le point de s'effondrer ! Au cas où vous l'auriez oublié, je risque ma vie tout autant que vous. Si nous continuons à rester plantés là sans rien faire, nous sommes tous morts. »

languages.text: "Gezegen paramparça olmak üzere! Unuttuysan hatırlatayım, en az sizin kadar ben de tehlikedeyim. Burada hiçbir şey yapmadan dikilmeye devam edersek hepimiz öleceğiz."
languages.original_text: "The planet is about to fall apart! In case you have forgotten, I am in as much danger as you are. If we continue to stand here doing nothing, we are all dead."

traits.locale_text: "Gezegen paramparça olmak üzere! Unuttuysan hatırlatayım, en az sizin kadar ben de tehlikedeyim. Burada hiçbir şey yapmadan dikilmeye devam edersek hepimiz öleceğiz."

languages.text: "Der Planet fällt gleich auseinander. Falls Ihr es vergessen habt. Ich bin ebenso in Gefahr, wie Ihr es seid. Wenn wir hier noch länger untätig herumstehen, werden wir alle sterben."
languages.original_text: "The planet is about to fall apart! In case you have forgotten, I am in as much danger as you are. If we continue to stand here doing nothing, we are all dead."

traits.locale_text: "Der Planet fällt gleich auseinander. Falls Ihr es vergessen habt. Ich bin ebenso in Gefahr, wie Ihr es seid. Wenn wir hier noch länger untätig herumstehen, werden wir alle sterben."
